summary: This bill, the Vehicle Axle Redistribution Increases Allow New Capacities for Efficiency Act (VARIANCE Act), amends title 23 of the United States Code to allow a weight variance for commercial motor vehicles transporting dry bulk goods. Specifically, it permits these vehicles to exceed the axle weight limits outlined in subsection (a) by up to 110 percent, excluding the maximum gross vehicle weight limitation. The bill defines "dry bulk goods" as homogeneous, unpackaged, nonliquid cargo transported in specialized trailers.
